replies.author: stkchi
replies.txt_content:
dy2084 发表于 2012-9-14 21:28 
够详细了= =你去原本的网站也详细不了多少的，而且图能直接把意思表达出来，还不用翻译
Coal Apple : Gives Jump 2 for 2 minutes
煤蘋果:跳躍(2),2分鐘

Obsidian Apple : Gives Jump 4 for 5 Minutes
黑曜石蘋果: 跳躍(4),5分鐘

Minor Diamond Apple : Gives Damage 2 for 2 minutes
(次要?)鑽石: 增加傷害(2) 2分鐘

Diamond Apple : Gives Damage 4 for 5 minutes
鑽石:增加傷害(4),5分鐘

...
Minor Lapis Apple : Gives Water Breathing for 2 minutes
Lapis apple : Gives water breather for 5 minutes
Minor Emerald Apple :  Gives Speed 2 for 2 minutes
Emerald Apple : Gives speed 4 for 5 minutes
Minor Iron Apple : Gives dig speed 2 for 2 minutes
Iron Apple : Gives dig speed 4 for 5 minutes
Glass Apple : Makes you invisible [ Does not work in 1.3.2 ]
Glow Apple : Night vision [ Does not work in 1.3.2]
Chocolate apple : Restores all hunger, makes you slow
Rotten Apple : ??????????
Minor Diamond Melon : Gives you Regen 2 for 15 seconds.
Iron Melon : Gives Regen 1 for 60 seconds
Lapis Melon : Gives Regen 2 for 120 seconds
Gold Melon : Gives Regen 3 for 180 Seconds
Diamond Melon : Gives Regen 4 for 240 seconds
Mushroom Apple : ??????

你連這些蘋果有甚麼用都懶得複製上來,也好說「夠詳細」
我不想說甚麼了,真的...
5tqw5g6+a5g+6ew5g物品真...
腐烂的苹果，玻璃苹果……铁西瓜……
